scripts.build: cd packages/polyfill-library && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.dev: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.install: npm run install:library && npm run install:service
scripts.install:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm install --save ../polyfill-library && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.lint: npm run lint:library && npm run lint:service
scripts.lint:library: cd packages/polyfill-library && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.lint:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.deploy-vcl: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run deploy-vcl && cd ../..
scripts.test-node: npm run test-node:library && npm run test-node:service
scripts.test-node:library: cd packages/polyfill-library && npm run test-node && cd ../..
scripts.test-node:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run test-node && cd ../..
scripts.test-node-unit:library: cd packages/polyfill-library && npm run test-node-unit && cd ../..
scripts.test-integration:service: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run test-integration && cd ../..
scripts.test-browser-ci: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run test-browser-ci && cd ../..
scripts.test-vcl: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm run test-vcl && cd ../..
scripts.whitesource: cd packages/polyfill-service && npm prune --production && cd ../.. && cd packages/polyfill-library && npm prune --production && cd ../.. && whitesource run
